TEXT.TITLE: PRUDENTIAL BORROWS FROM MINORITY BANKS
TEXT.BODY: <Prudential Insurance Co of America> said it has obtained a 35 mln dlr line of credit from a group of minority-owned banks led by Freedom National Bank of New York. It said funds will be used for general corporate purposes. Reuter
